description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Annihilate your opponents in this strategic twist on the classic game of Tic Tac Toe! Breed your X's and O's and maintain a stable population to defend against your attackers. Welcome to Extreme Tic Tac Toe.
